title: Blackletter in Film/TV Shows: Know any?
content:
I’ve been searching around trying to find film or television shows that use blackletter in their title but can’t seem to find or think of any that do! The only one I have right now is There Will Be Blood. There must be at least one other that uses blackletter, it can’t be /that/ difficult, can it? Anyway, would really appreciate some other examples.

 [‹ Know any good legibility tests for typefaces?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905131528/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41365 "Go to previous forum topic") [Please help me identify this font or find something similar ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905131528/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44962 "Go to next forum topic")
author: deepfriedmario

Any my favorite - reminds me of my last job...

Another one, from Ralf’s Flickr stream: [Harsh Times](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905131528/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/ralf_herrmann/292166721/in/pool-blackletter_today).

Not a TV show’s title, but still interesting: the knee-jerk reaction of German news to fall back on poor Fette Fraktur when it comes to illustrate obnoxious topics: [Rassismus](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905131528/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/70153157@N00/2295720603/in/pool-blackletter_today), [Hooligans](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905131528/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/70153157@N00/2296498750/in/pool-blackletter_today) (found by [Judith Schalansky](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905131528/http:/www.fraktur-mon-amour.de/)).

This was a Blackadder special from 1999: [Blackadder: Back & Forth](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905131528/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blackadder:_Back_%26_Forth)

I don’t think any of the original Blackadder TV series used blackletter for the titles, though there is some attempt at evocation of historical type styles.
